statements.select:
select * from psb_loc t where t.loc_enable = 1
t.loc_type_no = #where.LOC_TYPE#
t.loc_plc_no in ('J3108','J4108')
t.LOC_NAME like '%'|| #where.LOC_NAME# ||'%'
t.LOC_PLC_NO like '%'|| #where.LOC_PLC_NO# ||'%'
ORDER BY t.LOC_INDEX,t.LOC_NAME

select a.loc_type_no as sskey, a.loc_type_name as ssValue from (select t.loc_type_no, t.loc_type_name, 1 as idx from psb_loc_type t where t.loc_type_no in ('2001', '2002') union select t.loc_type_no, t.loc_type_name, 2 as idx from psb_loc_type t where t.loc_type_no in ('1000', '7001', '7002', '5000', '4000', '3001', '3002', '3000', '6001', '6002', '6021', '6022', '3011') union select 'QT' as loc_type_no, '其他（三角胶）' as loc_type_name, 1000 as idx from dual) a order by a.idx
